DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the impact of Propolis on proteinuria reduction and protection of the glomerular filtration rate in chronic renal failure patients.
DOC.brief_title: Propolis Effects in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.criteria: older than 18 years; less than 90 years; glomerular filtration rate between 25 and 70 ml / min; proteinuria in the urine 24 hours more than 300 mg or protein / creatinina in isolated urine greater than 0.3g / g or microalbuminuria (albumin / creatinine ratio) between 30300 mg / g. Pregnants; Neoplasia carrier; Renal transplant patients; Patients who refuse to participate in the study.
